name: Reversus Domum
description:
You are coming home after a long time.
But things seem different this time. Go on a journey into the woods after feeding your dog ..... if you dare!

This game was made within 48 hours.

Info: There is a freeze when going into the woods. That is NOT a crash! Just wait afew seconds for the next level to load. (fix upcoming)

Controls: WASD to move and E to interact.
